englishTitle: Metrical Epilogue to the Pastoral Care
author: Not available

text.0: ðis is nu se wæterscipe      ðe us wereda god
text.10: ðurh halga bec      hider on eorðan
text.14: ðæt he on unnyt      ut ne tofloweð.
text.15: Ac se wæl wunað      on weres breostum
text.16: ðurh dryhtnes giefe      diop and stille.
text.18: riðum torinnan;      nis ðæt rædlic ðing,
text.19: gif swa hlutor wæter,      hlud and undiop,
text.2: He cwæð ðæt he wolde      ðæt on worulde forð
text.20: tofloweð æfter feldum      oð hit to fenne werð.
text.21: Ac hladað iow nu drincan,      nu iow dryhten geaf
text.24: Fylle nu his fætels,      se ðe fæstne hider
text.26: Gif her ðegna hwelc      ðyrelne kylle
text.27: brohte to ðys burnan,      bete hine georne,
text.28: ðy læs he forsceade      scirost wætra,
text.29: oððe him lifes drync      forloren weorðe.
text.4: wætru fleowen,      ðe wel on hine
text.5: gelifden under lyfte.      Is hit lytel tweo
text.7: on hefonrice,      ðæt is halig gæst.
text.8: ðonan hine hlodan      halge and gecorene,
text.9: siððan hine gierdon      ða ðe gode herdon

source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
originalTitle: Metrical Epilogue to the Pastoral Care
